data.title: Gaming Companies - NEW! Archives - Page 2 of 6 - RemoteWork Source LLC
data.meta_description: Companies in the gaming industry, offering fully remote opportunities in gaming such as Game & System Design, Battle Artist, Environment Artist, 2D- and 3D-Art, Animation, Audio Engineer, Narrative Writing or Directing, Mission Design, Cinematic Artist/Animator/Modelling, Special Effects, and more.
data.text:
Crytek is an independent videogame developer, publisher, and technology provider dedicated to pushing the boundaries of gaming with its cutting-edge 3D game development solution CRYENGINE. They have created multiple award-winning titles, including the original Far Cry, the Crysis series, Ryse: Son of Rome, Warface, The Climb, Robinson: The Journey and Hunt: Showdown. They deliver fun and innovative gaming experiences for PC, consoles, and VR and continues to grow its reach in the games-as-a-service market. Every Crytek game is created with CRYENGINE, which can be used by anyone to create games on a Pay What You Want business model.

"Our ultimate goal is to deliver products that make us feel proud to have been there and been a part of it. But once we’ve achieved that, we won’t stop—we want to do it again, and better. So we want to build teams that feel inspired, challenged, and motivated by their work—not only does that make it fun to come to work every morning, it produces truly inspired results."

Also see: Avataris

Disruptive Games is an independent games development studio founded by industry veterans who have worked on some of the most recognizable and renowned games in the world. They’re dedicated to creating the highest quality game play experiences, with a special focus on pushing the boundaries of what can be done with connected game play. Their studio is built on original ideas, a strong work ethic, and a collaborative environment.

A few of their game titles include: Diablo II: Resurrected, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2, Godfall, and Megalith.

About Disruptive Games:

"We’re on a mission to redefine the state of play in the world of connected games. Our prime directive is to create a more meaningful, positive, and authentic experience, which is woven into the very fabric of our gameplay — creating more human experiences for both cooperative and competitive play."

Also see: Ubisoft

East Side Games is a proudly independent and profitable game studio with a collaborative, creative, and fun culture. Their games fund all their new projects, and everyone who works here has a direct impact on the day-to-day business.

Their talented, highly-motivated team believes in constantly improving; they are not afraid to take ownership and meet challenges head-on in order to reach their goals.

Purpose-built technology infrastructure powers their rapid, iterative prototyping, based directly on audience feedback. This allows East Side Games to take design ideas to playable releases in days rather than months.

What East Side Games says about Community:

"The community will always be an important part of our identity as it helped shape us into who we are today. We are grateful to now have the opportunity to support the locals through charities dedicated to helping vulnerable and marginalized individuals and families living in the downtown eastside.

As a team, we seek opportunities to learn and support other communities in meaningful ways. We value diversity, inclusiveness, and acceptance for all. We are honoured to collaborate with organizations across Canada in support of Indigenous, LGBTQIA2S+ and other underrepresented communities."

Also see: Sinking Ship Entertainment

Electronic Arts (EA) exists to Inspire the World to Play. They create extraordinary new game experiences for our millions of players everywhere by bringing together talented people that combine creativity, innovation, and passion. EA knows that their strength lies in the diversity of our people. They immerse their employees into an inclusive culture, and provide opportunities for learning and leading that allow them to do the most impactful and rewarding work of their careers.
